com.netflix.fenzo.sla

Interface ResAllocs


  • public interface ResAllocs
    Interface that represents resource allocation limits for a task group. This limits the sum of resources used by all tasks that have that task group name to the amounts provided.

    You obtain an object that implements this method by means of the ResAllocsBuilder.

    See Also:
    Resource Allocation Limits

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getCores()
      Limits the number of cores the task group can use to the number returned from this method.
      double getDisk()
      Limits the amount of disk space the task group can use to the number of MB returned from this method.
      double getMemory()
      Limits the amount of memory the task group can use to the number of MB returned from this method
      double getNetworkMbps()
      Limits the amount of bandwidth the task group can use to the number of megabits per second returned from this method.
      java.lang.String getTaskGroupName()
